Change Log
==========

0.1.0 (12/04/2023)
-------------------
- Out of Pre-Alpha
- Code rewritten from ground-up
- Removed reliance on matrix functions for calculations
- Added support for infinities (i.e; negative infinitesimal powers)
- Added limited support for fractional infinite / infinitesimal powers
- New natural logarithm algorithm for higher precision calculations (used in a majority of functions)
